      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Initializes the Appointments screen. The lambda expressions used to populate the cells allow for more readable code. Additionally, they avoid the use of PropertyValueFactory, which has a number of drawbacks related to how class getters/setters need to be formatted. However, one of the biggest drawbacks of the PropertyValueFactory is that the table needs to be re-sorted or redrawn in some way before any changes to the cell data will be visible. The lambda expression does not have this same drawback.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - The path of the root object.
        resourceBundle - The ResourceBundle of the root object.
